Title: Beloved comrade Xiaoping - Fighting successively in the Taihang Mountains
Publisher: Sichuan meishu chubanshe (四川美术出版社)
Notes: Deng Xiaoping and Liu Bocheng led the 1940 campaign against Guomindang and Japanese troops in the Taihang Mountain region (太行山, Taihang shan; Shanxi, Henan and Hebei provinces).
